user.about: questions, concerns, requests, or anything else can be sent to my tumblr ask and i'll reply right away. thanks!! (((i change my url a lot so if that link below doesn't work check here.)))

additional_info: this is one of the first home buttons i've made so i'm happy with it but feel i could make a better looking image. i may make a new version of this later. for now though i think it's super cute!! i have other buttons and some themes that are also karneval related on my page if you're interested in any other styles ^-^ UPDATE 11/17: i had a hosting issue but i've switched all my files over to photobucket and replaced the broken image link in this code, so it should work again :) if you have any questions or concerns you can shoot me a message here!!
